# xelon_persistent_storage (Data Source)

The persistent storage data source provides information about an existing storage.

## Example Usage

### Using ID

```terraform
data "xelon_persistent_storage" "db" {
  id = "30a31b4df2"
}
```

### Using name

```terraform
data "xelon_persistent_storage" "db" {
  name = "Database volume for CSI"
}
```

### Using ID and name

```terraform
data "xelon_persistent_storage" "db" {
  id   = "30a31b4df2"
  name = "Database volume for CSI"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the persistent storage.
- `name` (String) The persistent storage name.

### Read-Only

- `cloud_id` (String) The ID of the cloud.
- `size` (Number) The size of the persistent storage in GB.
- `tenant_id` (String) The tenant ID to whom the persistent storage belongs.
- `uuid` (String) The unique identifier for the persistent storage device.
